markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How can I apply for GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017753033-How-can-I-apply-for-GFunds)
- [What is the Risk Profile Questionnaire (RPQ) in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004631723-What-is-the-Risk-Profile-Questionnaire-RPQ-in-GFunds)
- [What investment products are available on GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/5951847409049-What-investment-products-are-available-on-GFunds)
- [Does GFunds have a minimum maintaining balance to keep funds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30839343392153-Does-GFunds-have-a-minimum-maintaining-balance-to-keep-funds)
- [What are the GFunds fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30841717008025-What-are-the-GFunds-fees-I-need-to-know-about)
- [What is the Net Asset Value per Unit (NAVPU) of a Fund in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360038778233-What-is-the-Net-Asset-Value-per-Unit-NAVPU-of-a-Fund-in-GFunds)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

GFunds offers different investment products for different risk appetites and minimum initial investment deposit. See detailed information on these below:

### [ATRAM Trust Corporation (ATRAM Trust)](http://www.atram.com.ph/)

| **Fund Name** | **Risk Rating** | **Minimum Initial / Additional Investment** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| [ATRAM Peso Money Market Fund](https://www.atram.com.ph/funds/uitf/ATRPHMM) | Conservative | PHP 50 |
| [ATRAM Total Return Peso Bond Fund](https://www.atram.com.ph/funds/uitf/ATRPHFI) | Moderate | PHP 50 |
| [ATRAM Global Health Care Fund](https://www.atram.com.ph/funds/uitf/ATRGHCP) | Moderately Aggressive | PHP 1,000 |
| [ATRAM Global Infra Equity Fund](https://www.atram.com.ph/funds/uitf/ATRGIEP) | Moderate Aggressive | PHP 1,000 |
| [ATRAM Philippine Sustainable Development and Growth Fund](https://www.atram.com.ph/funds/uitf/ATRSDGA) | Aggressive | PHP 50 |
| [ATRAM Global Equity Opportunity Fund](https://www.atram.com.ph/funds/uitf/ATRGEQP) | Aggressive | PHP 1,000 |
| [ATRAM Philippine Equity Smart Index Fund](https://www.atram.com.ph/funds/uitf/ATRPHSE) | Aggressive | PHP 50 |
| [ATRAM Global Consumer Trends Feeder Fund](https://www.atram.com.ph/funds/uitf/ATRCTRP) | Aggressive | PHP 1,000 |
| [ATRAM Global Technology Feeder Fund](https://www.atram.com.ph/funds/uitf/ATRGTEC) | Aggressive | PHP 1,000 |

### [BPI Investment Management](https://www.alfmmutualfunds.com/)

| **Fund Name** | **Risk Rating** | **Minimum Initial / Additional Investment** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| [Philippine Stock Index Fund](https://www.bpiassetmanagement.com/pages/bpi-invest-philippine-equity-index-fund) | Aggressive | PHP 50 |
| [ALFM- Global Multi-Asset Income Fund](https://www.alfmmutualfunds.com/funds/alfm-global-muti-asset-income-fund-php) | Aggressive | PHP 1,000 |

**Note:** Opening any GFunds account will qualify you for a GCash wallet and transaction limit increase to PHP500,000.

### **Need more Help?**

For other inquiries or concerns, check out the following articles:

- [How can I apply for GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017753033-How-can-I-apply-for-GFunds)
- [What is the Risk Profile Questionnaire (RPQ) in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900004631723)
- [What are the GFunds fees I need to know about?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30841717008025)
- [How can I buy funds in GFunds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/5351243796377)
- [Does GFunds have a minimum maintaining balance to keep funds?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30839343392153)

- [Manulife\_Risk\_Disclosure.pdf](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/38418763661465)
